item.title: Creating the Logbook Project
item.description: Track billed hours to separate buckets The problem Keeping track of the ‘real’ hours worked vs the adjusted ‘billed’ hours can be tricky. They are different, and we need a system to keep track of billed hours. This is for companies that have clients that buy ‘Buckets’ of hours and then slowly use those hours for support and development. Support staff need to be able to answer the question: How many hours does this client have left?
